title: The Walking Dead star Jeffrey Dean Morgan secretly marries long-time girlfriend
text:

The Walking Dead star Jeffrey Dean Morgan has become a married man for the second time after tying-the-knot with long-time girlfriend Hilarie Burton.

The 53-year-old television actor and his 37-year-old actress wife surprised fans by sharing their happy news at the beginning of the week.

Taking to Instagram to share a romantic black and white photo of herself in Jeffrey’s arms, Hilarie made the announcement that she is now the new Mrs Morgan after a decade of being with her lover.

“I just want to put it out there that WE GOT MARRIED! For real,” the actress wrote in the caption of the heartwarming photo - before she went on to make some corrections about their romantic past.

(Image: jeffreydeanmorgan /Instagram)

“We’ve lived as husband and wife for a decade... For years, publications have reported that we got married in 2014 or 2015 and that I’ve been married and divorced before. All untrue,” she declared.

“But WE knew our truth. So it felt silly to try and correct anything,” she added.

Her post began by stating: “This past weekend was the best of my entire life. There are dozens of thank yous I need to make. So bear with me over the next week as I gush over the amazing group of people who gave us this beautiful moment.”

The actress went on: “Here’s the God’s honest fact: From the moment I met @jeffreydeanmorgan, he was my husband. Rather than make vows right out of the gate, we lived them. For over ten years. The good times and the bad.”

(Image: SplashNews.com)

She continued: “Standing up there with our children at our sides - celebrating all that has been - was bliss.”

She then gushingly added: “I love you Jeffrey. I love our intimate group of friends and family who joined us. I love the various circles of loved ones who have supported us over the years. It was private and magical and everything I dreamed. So yeah. I’m Mrs. Morgan.”

She then added a date to confirm the marriage had taken place on Saturday 5 October.

Meanwhile Jeffrey shared more images and gushing commentary on his own Instagram feed.

“I’d say words... but there aren’t any. Mrs Morgan.... I love you. Thank you for making me the luckiest man in the world,” he wrote as he shared a photo of him with his wife gazing over the side of a building.

(Image: Â© AMC Film Holdings LLC. All Rights Reserved.)

He continued: “Ok. A few words... It was an intimate ceremony... performed by @jensenackles and @bigbaldhead with our kids at our sides... and the party of the century afterwards... thank you to all our friends and family. It was, without a doubt... the best day of our lives. Ever ever. Just never knew that it could be so damn perfect. It was. And more.”

Jeffery and Hilarie have son who was born in March 2010 and a daughter born in March 2018.

Jeffery has been married to actress Anya Longwell between 1992 and 2003 - while Hilarie was believed to have been married to Ian Prange between 2004 and 2009.
description: The American television star made One Tree Hill actress Hilarie Burton his lawfully wedded wife on Saturday
